Pre-Game Insights: Both teams are preparing for UEFA Euro 2024, set to be held in Germany, where Hungary will compete in Group A and Turkey in Group F.
Hungary finished as undefeated leaders of Group G in the qualifiers for the European continental tournament and haven’t suffered a defeat since September 2022.
Turkey topped Group D with just one loss in the qualifiers and aims to gain momentum and extend their unbeaten run of four matches, which includes victories against Germany and Croatia.
